SELECT a.user_no , a.user_id , a.password , b.rank_id as "rank.rank_id" , b.rank_name as "rank.rank_name" FROM user a JOIN rank b ON (a.rank_id=b.rank_id) WHERE user_id = #{ userId } AND is_deleted = 'N'
SELECT user_id, email FROM user WHERE email = #{ email } AND is_deleted = 'N'
SELECT b.phone as "user_info.phone" FROM user a JOIN user_info b ON (a.user_no = b.user_no) WHERE b.phone = #{ phone }
SELECT a.user_id , a.username , a.email , a.gender , b.birth , b.phone , b.address FROM user a JOIN user_info b ON (a.user_no = b.user_no) WHERE a.user_id = #{ userId } AND a.is_deleted = 'N'
SELECT user_no , user_id , password , email , gender , rank_id , login_type , is_deleted , username FROM user WHERE user_no = #{userNo} AND is_deleted = 'N'
